com.github.dkharrat.nexusdata.core

Class AtomicStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdata.core.PersistentStore
      • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdata.core.AtomicStore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InMemoryPersistentStore

    public abstract class AtomicStore
extends PersistentStore
    An AtomicStore is a persistence store in which data is loaded and saved all at once. It is useful when the data set is small enough to fit in memory and good performance is needed.

      • loadMetadata

        protected void loadMetadata()
        Description copied from class: PersistentStore
        Called when the PersistentStore is first loaded in order to load the store's metadata (e.g. store UUID, type, etc.). A store's metadata must at minimum contain the store's UUID, which can be set by calling PersistentStore.setUuid(UUID).
        Specified by:
        loadMetadata in class PersistentStore
